title: Truck Racer-RELOADED (2013) PC [ENG/Multi6]

============================================
Truck Racer-RELOADED (2013) PC [ENG/Multi6]
============================================

- ENG, DEU, FR, IT, ESP, HOL

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Take the wheel of a truck hurtling along at top speed, blow away your opponents and claim victory!

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

 * Drive on 48 tracks in vehicles that can be completely destroyed
 * Customize every aspect of your truck, from engine to paint
 * Rise to all the challenges in Championship mode and upgrade your truck
 * Take on your friends online or in split screen

============================================
RePack:                                    =
============================================

* Nothing was Ripped
* Audio/Video 100%
* Crack (RELOADED)

============================================

============================================

* Install
* Play
